Package net.explorviz.settings.services

Class SettingsRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.settings.services.SettingsRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MongoRepository<Setting,​java.lang.String>, net.explorviz.shared.querying.Queryable<Setting>
    @Service
public class SettingsRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements MongoRepository<Setting,​java.lang.String>, net.explorviz.shared.querying.Queryable<Setting>
    This service is responsible for persisting and retrieving Setting objects. It is backed by mongodb.
